title: Update executor to use mission sandboxes for task execution
description:
Update executor to look up and use mission sandbox when executing tasks.

CURRENT:
- Executor executes tasks in parent repo directory
- No sandbox context passed to agents

NEEDED:
- Before claiming task: GetMissionForTask(taskID)
- Look up mission sandbox metadata from vc_mission_state
- Pass sandbox path to agent executor (working directory)
- Agent commits go to mission branch (not main)

FLOW:
1. Executor claims ready task
2. GetMissionForTask() walks deps to find parent mission epic
3. Load sandbox_path and branch_name from vc_mission_state
4. If no sandbox exists yet, call CreateMissionSandbox()
5. Execute agent with sandbox.Path as working directory
6. Agent's commits go to mission branch

This enables all tasks in a mission to share the same sandbox and see each other's changes.
acceptance_criteria:
- Executor calls GetMissionForTask() before execution
- Looks up sandbox metadata from vc_mission_state
- Creates sandbox if missing (auto-create on first task)
- Passes sandbox path to agent as working directory
- Agent executes in sandbox, not parent repo
- Commits go to mission branch
- Tests verify multiple tasks share same sandbox
